    • Method Detail

      • authorize

        protected User authorize(String path,
                         org.json.JSONObject content,
                         Map<String,String> headers)
                  throws AuthorizationException
        The user identified in the AuthenticatedUser headers must be authorized to perform this action. For HTTP, MDW removes this header (if it exists) from every request and then populates based on session authentication or HTTP Basic.
        Parameters:
        content -
        Returns:
        authorized user if successful
        Throws:
        AuthorizationException

      • getRequiredWorkgroups

        protected List<Workgroup> getRequiredWorkgroups(org.json.JSONObject content)
                                         throws org.json.JSONException,
                                                DataAccessException
        Parameters:
        content -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException
        DataAccessException

      • getRoles

        public List<String> getRoles(String path)
        TODO: pass HTTP Method A user who belongs to any role in the returned list is allowed to perform this action/method. Override to open access beyond Site Admin.
        Parameters:
        path -
        Returns:
        list of role names or null if authorization not required
